import React from 'react'; import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { logoutUser } from '../../redux/actions/users/userActions'; const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const history = useHistory(); const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; //logout handler const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logoutUser()); history.push('/'); }; return (

  • dispatch(logoutUser())}> Logout

); }; export default Header;
